players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Alice last night - she's town. Diana must be mafia trying to frame me."
Bob: "Diana is clearly lying. I investigated Alice and she's town. Diana is the only one who could be mafia trying to frame me."
You: "I believe Bob. I was investigated last night and he said I'm a town member."
Diana: "I am the detective. Bob is lying - he is mafioso. Check voting records, he's trying to save himself."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
